items.general:
For any help in using WP Socializer, requesting new features or reporting bugs you can use the links given below.

  1. Bug report
  2. Free support forum.

Other ways of using WP Socializer

Despite using WP Socializer only above and below posts, you can use the sharing buttons in any place of your theme using the shortcodes and the template functions.

For avaialble functions, button customizations, parameter references check the links below.

  1. Function and parameter reference for both template functions and shortcodes.
  2. Manual placement
